title: shrI vENugOpAlam
sahitya:
shrI vENugOpAlam bhaja mAnasa satatam dEvEndra pUjitam divya ratna bhUSitam


anupallavi

 vEdAgama ghOSitam vidhi guruguha mahitam nandagOpa kumAram navanIta cOram


caraNam   gOvardhana giridharam gOpastrI jAram manda hAsa vadanam mukundam 
madhu sUdanam dEvakI nandanam mrdu caraNam nIraja nayanam
